attributes.additional_details:
Everyday thousands of people take to the web to search for a mutual exchange and face disappointment.
Stuck in cramped flats with No garden for there children.
Your not allowed to keep animals like it so why children?
People are saying they won't exchange there garden for a communal garden because they have pets. What about our children?
How is this fair that our kids can't play outside because it's not safe on the streets and they have no garden. What will this do to our child's development ?
We need 100,000 signatures for this to be looked at and we have 12 months to do it. If you feel just as passionate please sign and share. TOGETHER WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE.
